title: Tua Tagovailoa, Tom Brady, Browns, and free agency
itunes:title: Tua Tagovailoa, Tom Brady, Browns, and free agency
description:
Colin gives his reasons why he would draft Tua Tagovailoa, why Patriots owner Robert Kraft is letting Tom Brady test free agency, why Brady feels disrespected, why he believes the Cleveland Browns will continue to have issues, and who are the top available quarterbacks he would go after. Guests include Charlotte Flair, Mark Medina, Brady Poppinga, and Ric Bucher.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
